channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Why are we worried about memory access semantics? Full barriers should be enough for anybody】为什么我们担心内存访问语义？完整的障碍对任何人来说都应该足够了
item.description: 【Commenter Shawn wondered why we are so worried about memory access semantics. Back in my day, we just used full barriers everywhere, and I didn't hear nobody complainin'.】评论者肖恩想知道为什么我们如此担心内存访问语义。在我那个时代，我们只是到处都使用了完整的屏障，而且我没有听到任何人抱怨。

item.title: 【Reading the fine print, episode 4: Holiday promotions】阅读细则，第 4 集：假日促销
item.description: 【I ran across a promotion from a hotel. Join us for the holidays with this promotion code. But if you read down to the fine print, it also says Limited number of rooms available for each date. May not be valid during holiday】我偶然发现了一家酒店的促销活动。使用此促销代码加入我们的假期。但如果您仔细阅读细则，它还会显示每个日期的可用房间数量有限。节假日期间可能无效

item.title: 【Why is the last letter of my string not making it to the clipboard?】为什么我的字符串的最后一个字母没有进入剪贴板？
item.description: 【Just to see what happens, a customer called Set­ClipboardData(CF_TEXT) and passed a memory block that was intentionally not null-terminated. They found that when they subsequently pasted the string (say, into Notepad), the last character didn't get pasted. As a second experiment, they over-allocated the buffer b】为了看看会发生什么，一位客户调用 SetClipboardData(CF_TEXT) 并传递了一个故意不以 null 终止的内存块。他们发现，当他们随后粘贴字符串（例如，粘贴到记事本中）时，最后一个字符没有被粘贴。作为第二个实验，他们过度分配了缓冲区 b

item.title: 【Why does my <KBD>Ctrl</KBD>+<KBD>M</KBD> accelerator key activate when I press the <KBD>Enter</KBD> key?】为什么当我按 <KBD>Enter</KBD> 键时，我的 <KBD>Ctrl</KBD>+<KBD>M</KBD> 加速键会激活？
item.description: 【A customer didn't understand why their Win32 accelerator key for Ctrl+M was triggering spuriously. Specifically, it was triggering when the user hit the Enter key, which is nothing like the Ctrl+M two-key combination. They defined their accelerator table like this: IDA】客户不明白为什么他们的 Ctrl+M 的 Win32 加速键会被错误地触发。具体来说，它是在用户按下 Enter 键时触发的，这与 Ctrl+M 两键组合完全不同。他们这样定义加速器表：IDA

item.title: 【When irate product support customers demand to speak to Bill Gates】当愤怒的产品支持客户要求与比尔·盖茨交谈时
item.description: 【A colleague of mine who used to work in product support told me that they had a procedure if a customer became irate and demanded to speak with Bill Gates. (This was, of course, back in the days when Bill Gates still ran the company.) The product support technician would apologize for not resolving the problem to the customer's sati】我的一位曾经在产品支持部门工作的同事告诉我，如果客户生气并要求与比尔·盖茨交谈，他们有一套程序。 （当然，这是在比尔盖茨仍在经营公司的时代。）产品支持技术人员会因为没有解决客户满意的问题而道歉。

item.title: 【SharePoint Framework (SPFx) roadmap update – December 2025】SharePoint 框架 (SPFx) 路线图更新 – 2025 年 12 月
item.description: 【As we close out 2025, we want to pause and reflect on what has been an extraordinary year for the SharePoint Framework (SPFx). We continue to be humbled by the momentum of the platform and the scale of impact it enables across Microsoft 365. Tens of millions of users】在 2025 年即将结束之际，我们想停下来思考一下对于 SharePoint 框架 (SPFx) 来说是不平凡的一年。我们继续对该平台的势头及其在 Microsoft 365 中产生的影响规模感到谦卑。数千万用户

item.title: 【How AI fixed my procrastination】人工智能如何解决我的拖延症
item.description: 【I struggled to get started. For ages, I kept putting off building this website, creating a new programming language for Visual Studio, and coming up with fresh color themes. Each project looked overwhelming, and I couldn’t find the time or motivation to jump in. It all just felt like too much at once. But when a national holiday gave me a】我很难开始。多年来，我一直推迟构建这个网站、为 Visual Studio 创建新的编程语言以及提出新的颜色主题。每个项目看起来都让人不知所措，我找不到时间或动力去投入。这一切感觉一下子太多了。但当国庆节给了我一个

item.title: 【All the other cool languages have try...finally. C++ says "We have try...finally at home."】所有其他很酷的语言都有尝试...最后。 C++ 说“我们已经尝试了...终于在家了。”
item.description: 【Many languages¹ that have exceptions also have a finally clause, so you can write try { ⟦ stuff ⟧ } finally { always(); } A quick checks shows that this control structure exists in Java, C#, Python, JavaScript, but not C++. C++ says, "We have try...finally at home."】许多有异常的语言 1 也有一个 finally 子句，所以你可以写 try { ⟦ stuff ⟧ }finally {always();快速检查表明该控制结构存在于 Java、C#、Python、JavaScript 中，但不存在于 C++ 中。 C++ 说：“我们已经尝试过了……终于到家了。”

item.title: 【The New Test Run Hub is Going Generally Available!】新的测试运行中心即将全面上线！
item.description: 【Delivering high-quality software requires clarity, speed, and collaboration. That’s why we introduced the New Test Run Hub in Azure Test Plans. A modern, streamlined experience designed to make test execution and analysis fast and】交付高质量的软件需要清晰度、速度和协作。这就是我们在 Azure 测试计划中引入新测试运行中心的原因。现代化、简化的体验，旨在使测试执行和分析快速且可靠

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) Dec 2025 - Extensions Enhancements, Foundry Rebranding, and Azure Pipelines Improvements】Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) 2025 年 12 月 - 扩展增强、Foundry 品牌重塑和 Azure Pipelines 改进
item.description: 【Welcome to the December 2025 edition of the Azure Developer CLI (azd) release blog—our final release of the year! This post covers releases 1.22.0 through 1.22.5, wrapping up 2025. To share your feedback and questions, join the December release discussion on GitHub.】欢迎来到 2025 年 12 月版的 Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) 发布博客 - 我们今年的最后一个版本！本文涵盖 1.22.0 至 1.22.5 版本，截至 2025 年。要分享您的反馈和问题，请加入 GitHub 上的 12 月版本讨论。
